alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 14 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Douglas and Elbert Counties in Colorado, including Castle Rock and Elizabeth. * WHEN...Until 815 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 615 PM MDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Castle Rock, southwestern Parker, Elbert, Elizabeth, Larkspur, Franktown, The Pinery, Greenland, Ponderosa Park, Castle Pines, Perry Park, Sedalia, Louviers and Castlewood Canyon.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
